name: starter-event-platform
description: Next.js 14 event platform starter with event listings, speaker profiles, ticket tiers, schedule timeline, and countdown timer. Purple/violet theme. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router.
postMessage:
EventPulse event platform starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npm run dev

Customize your events by editing lib/data.ts (events, speakers, schedule, tickets) and replace placeholder SVGs with real images.
